thread.title_full: Go eclectic for unique décor - The Times of India

author: Rekha Kavoor
title: Go eclectic for unique décor
text:
You can bring an exotic feel to your home with an eclectic style of interior decor.
Give your home an exotic feel by combining various styles, time periods, colours, textures and patterns. This decor style, called eclectic, is for people who love something about different decor styles. It is a combination of both old and new styles and allows for a great deal of flexibility. An eclectic home has many elements but they all share a commonality, whether it's tonality, line, shape or pattern. Eclectic style grants you the freedom of mixing and matching different decor styles and creating your own unique decor. There is only one major rule for this style the decor should look consistent and harmonious.
DESIGN PRINCIPLES
This style undeniably requires skill, basic knowledge of design principles and a vision. Contrast is an important characteristic of an eclectic style. Accessories could also be a point of contrast. Follow the concept of closeness in seating pieces.
To tie together a variety of decorative styles, it is impor tant to give parts of the interior a timeless treatment.For windows, however, choose treatments that defy time, such as straight-hanging drapery.Roman shades are easy to live with. It's not always important to match the knick-knacks you pick up with the theme of your home, as long as you introduce just a few pieces. But if possible, match them with the decor.
COLOUR AND CHARACTER
Colour is a crucial point for this design theme. Add character to your eclectic decor by mixing the wood finishes or fabric patterns.Otherwise, create a unique feature by purchasing readymade drapes and adding a band of custom fabric to the top or bottom.
Spaces decorated in an eclectic style can easily change according to mood, inspiration and budget.Blend a mix of styles. Don't overwhelm small rooms with an abundance of upholstery.Select furnishings with slender lines. Remember, pale and neutral colours have a low impact on the decor.
An eclectic style can combine smooth shiny tiles with deep rich wood. Go for uniquely-designed items, customised range of furni ture or display accessories.
Don't be hesitant to mix patterns, textures and colours. Experiment with silks, wood, glass and dif ferent textures to highlight design elements unique lighting is a must. Opt for LEDs for concealed light ing.
CONTRASTS
Contrast is key to an eclec tic style. Sometimes the lesser pieces have in com mon, the more they set each other off. However, it is im portant to pick your con trasts carefully as too many contrasts create chaos.
Though you are provided with the freedom to dare with this style, the princi ples concerning form, scale, composition and propor tion are to be kept in mind while designing under this style. Contrasts in textures offer interesting visuals.Green plants add a fascinating backdrop to smooth ceramic pots, figurines or sculptures. Bamboo blinds will add a soothing texture to a multifaceted room with an eclectic ensemble of furniture and accessories.
DISTINCT STYLE
The house you stay is an extension of you and should echo your taste while keeping the rules of the decor style in which it is done up. Most handicraft stores have an interesting array of things that will fit right into your home.When you buy an object, think of all the ways in which you can use it besides its original purpose. You will be surprised to discover the possibilities. Let your style reflect in everything you bring into your home. It's a sure-shot way to make your decor unique.
